GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
netfilter: nft_payload: incorrect arithmetics when fetching VLAN header bits

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit 76ef74d4a379faa451003621a84e3498044e7aa3, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit f6ae9f120dada00abfb47313364c35118469455f. For more details please see the references link.
